com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video.exo

Class ExoSurfaceVideoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video.ResizingSurfaceView
          • com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video.exo.ExoSurfaceVideoView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, VideoViewApi, ClearableSurface

    public class ExoSurfaceVideoView
extends ResizingSurfaceView
implements VideoViewApi
    A VideoViewApi implementation that uses the ExoPlayer as the backing media player.

      • setDrmCallback

        public void setDrmCallback(MediaDrmCallback drmCallback)
        Description copied from interface: VideoViewApi
        Sets the MediaDrmCallback to use when handling DRM for media. This should be called before specifying the videos uri or path
        NOTE: DRM is only supported on API 18 +
        Specified by:
        setDrmCallback in interface VideoViewApi
        Parameters:
        drmCallback - The callback to use when handling DRM media

      • restart

        public boolean restart()
        Description copied from interface: VideoViewApi
        Prepares the media previously specified for playback. This should only be called after the playback has completed to restart playback from the beginning.
        Specified by:
        restart in interface VideoViewApi
        Returns:
        true if the media was successfully restarted
